meanings.definition: The act of not allowing someone to enter or join a group or place.
meanings.sent1: The nonadmission of the uninvited guest caused a stir at the party.
meanings.sent2: The nonadmission to the exclusive club disappointed many hopeful members.
meanings.sent3: The nonadmission of the clown to the serious meeting led to some unexpected laughter.
meanings.sent4: Her nonadmission into the inner circle left her feeling like an outsider.
meanings.sent5: The nonadmission of the key player from the game changed the outcome significantly.

meanings.definition: The state of being denied entry or access.
meanings.sent1: After the nonadmission at the gate, they had to find another way in.
meanings.sent2: The nonadmission to the event left them feeling excluded.
meanings.sent3: The nonadmission to the library made him realize he had forgotten his card.
meanings.sent4: Her nonadmission to the secret club made her more curious about what was inside.
meanings.sent5: The nonadmission to the restricted area made him wonder what secrets were hidden there.
